roleset.name: formation of abnormal notching around the edge (of a cell, etc) due to water loss

example.name: crenate-v: args 1, 2
example.text: The second series of experiments was designed to show what effect hemolysin and complement would have upon blood cells [which]-1 had been crenated *-1 once with varying concentrations of hypertonic solutions.
example.arg: with varying concentrations of hypertonic solutions

example.name: crenation-n
example.text: When blood is stored, the crenation of the red cells is associated with de- pletion of ATP.

example.name: crenate-j
example.text: The red were crenate probably from saliva.
